column5: the Anti-Narcotics Unit cracked down on the “Sophea” condominium located on Street 352
column8: where a Chinese man was used as a processing facility. Drug production.------According to a report from the local authority
column9: the Ministry of Interior’s Department of Drug Enforcement (A10)
column10: in cooperation with several relevant authorities led by Deputy Prosecutor Kuch Kimlong
column11: cracked down room B(?) on the second floor of the “Sophea” condominium and detained  a 56-year-old Chinese man
column13: and confiscated several criminal items.------The suspect is currently being referred to the Ministry of Interior’s Anti-Narcotics Unit (10) for control and follow-up procedures. The remainder of the evidence is being kept in the room while the investigation is continuing. ------NKD
